author: mrshin
title: Great parts, looks great and makes loads of different items.
review:
This set adds so much awesomeness to any duplo train track.  It's a station with a very cool see-through canopy but you can use the parts to make just about anything. 

The see-through roof piece is a fantastic part on its own. 

The station scene is classic and fun and kids love playing with it.  Quite a few useful parts in this set.  Great concepts for a platform which you can extend easily to make longer platforms with other pieces.
